main event: An unidentified object was recovered by the United States Air Force at RAF Station Mildenhall, England on 26 April 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1-2 minutes and was based on visual contact,The object was recorded as having a radar tracking device and a trail of balloons attached to it,The UK believed the object to be an experimental satellite or launch vehicle,The object was described as approximately five feet in diameter and weighed around six ounces,It was initially seen at around 1600 hours and landed in a tree line at the base.
witness description: William Scarborough and William Gars, stationed nearby.
